channel.title: Cloakscape New Coder Check This Out Guys
channel.description:
hey peepz going to show my server that iv been coding the last couple of days and if you have any ideas please reply and i can add then :)
before the screens, anyone have a better name than cloakscape? i find it kinda gay and want some a bitter more imaginitive and attractive
try and guess what source this is, if your right you get a cookie.
little bit of info -
full barrows with tunnal :) all items all specials OK eco ... not to easy no way is it hard to make cash.. slow xp (i need help changing guys)
screens :
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/Untitled9.jpg[/img]
suppose id better add some credits - scary mods might beat me up.
*mopar TuTs (Jeremy368 you sexy beast tyvm) *the base from - uhh guess. *me *runeloc (object codes)
wasent really sure if i needed to add credits - better safe than sorry tbh.
please be nice iv just attempted coding
i do plan of opening to the public and if people like i can reliase to mopar so any ideas are VERY helpfull
can anyone help me port forward? having trouble and been editing using my router IP as the ip to log on.
add my msn please :) - thehorrors666@aol.com
o - and can anyone help me making safe zones into wildy zones and changing the xp per hit? - thanks.

item.title: Cloakscape New Coder Check This Out Guys
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:14, topic:257392”][quote author=lewis` link=topic=339823.msg2636979#msg2636979 date=1232583207]

[quote author=P I M P 3 D Tut link=topic=339823.msg2636969#msg2636969 date=1232582966]

suppose id better add some credits - scary mods might beat me up.
[/quote] Haha. I lol’d.

Looks nice?

thanks i try,

i dont kno but i tried and it was the first time ever attempted trying to add a g.e and some custom items, reading up on a new tuts on mopar and google.
[/quote] Awesome. Finally someone with common sense.
Grats dude.[/quote]

thanks for the good comments

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:16, topic:257392”]good start on basics, do it till ur kay with it.

  1. i think from your pics that they is alot of stuff in varrock, shops, home, stalls ect ect…

i would suggest a place that is big and a wierd place for a start area since most people use the basic homes, (varrok,fally,ardy,edge) ect…

spread out shops abit more.

just think what other sources (servers) do not have that you could include to make it different.[/quote]

ok i based it around varrock because its the place to be on real runescape and its never really been a place that people make homes on other private servers so i thought it whould be interesting.
